border.description: The field's frame: Type (solid, dashed, beveled, inset, underline), width of the frame

displayname.description: The element's functional role, relevant for signature fields

externRole.description: The element's technical role for external editing, relevant for signature fields

image.description: The annotation's tag text if type=image

required.description: Is this annotation a required field (currently only works for signatures)

role.description: The element's technical role, relevant for signature fields

servertimestamp.description: The server timestamp when the annotation was created

signatureLevel.description: Signature level. Only present for signatures. Can be SES, AES or QES

size.description: The Annotation's font size if type=text

trace.description: Stack trace in case of exceptions

type.description: The annotation's type: signature,image or text

typedText.description: The annotation's text which was typed in

validationError.description: Error message in case of failed field validation

validationWarning.description: Warning message in case of failed field validation

time.description: Zeitpunkt an dem dieser Wert verndert wurde

value.description: Wert der Annotation bis zum nderungszeipunt 'time'

notification.description: ID of the message that is responsible for the call

abschliesen.description: Indicates if the hand out occurred when completing the process

bestaetigtTimestamp.description: Indicates when the hand out was confirmed, if a confirmation workflow for hand outs is configured. (Recipient confirms receiption of the documents by clicking a link in the hand out e-mail)

docInfos.description: Returns the DocumentInfo for the documents which were handed out

docids.description: Deprecated: Returns the documents which were handed out

email.description: Lists the e-mail addresses to which the documents were handed out

sms.description: Lists the phone numbers to which the documents were handed out

timestamp.description: Point in time at which the documents were handed out

typen.description: Indicates how the documents were handout out, i.e. e-mail, file, paper, sms

passwordTransmissionType.description: The password transmission user decision radio selection. Values:(nopassword,email,sms)

passwordTransmissionValue.description: The value related to the user decision. Holds the emailid/phoneno password

pairingToken.description: Pairing token when calling via the smartphone app

newowner.description: the user ID of the new owner

sessionid.description: The session ID of the session to be changed

ausfuellbar.description: Does this session contain fillable fields?

completed.description: Was the process completed successfully? I.e. everything was signed and read and finish was clicked. If 'read on paper' is selected or the process is cancelled this value is false.

dsgvoDeclined.description: Has the GDPR consent been declined?

extern.description: Is the process being edited by another user?

offline.description: Is the process being edited offline on another device?

offlineAvailable.description: Is the process available for offline editing?

processStep.description: The process step the session is currently in

specialStatus.description: Does the session have a special status?

status.description: Status that is displayed in the process manager

pairingToken.description: Pairing token which the device received during paring

userID.description: User ID which the device received during paring

defaultPosition.description: Default position for QES. Gets overriden by specific document position. Deprecated since 3.27 use signature with level 'QES' instead
defaultPosition.$ref: #/definitions/Position defintion inside a document. Deprecated since 3.27 use signature with level 'QES' instead

positions.description: Position of the QES in each document. If neither this nor a defaultPosisition is set, no QES will be placed in the document. Deprecated since 3.27 use signature with level 'QES' instead

additionalProperties.$ref: #/definitions/Position defintion inside a document. Deprecated since 3.27 use signature with level 'QES' instead

qesType.description: Deprecated: To enable the QES set to 'QES'. Disabled by setting to 'NONE'.

Configuration for the qualified electron.title: Configuration for the qualified electronic signature

allowFormEditing.description: Specifies whether the document may be changed via the PDF editor. Optional. Default value is true.

cryptOwnerPassword.description: Owner Password of the PDF file if available.

cryptUserPassword.description: User Password of the PDF file if available.

disableAppendMode.description: Disable Append mode. Do not activate this unless instructed to do so.

displayname.description: Display name of the document in the GUI, emails, etc. It is configurable via application properties if and when this is used.

file.description: The actual document as a byte array. Base-64 encoded. Null allowed when uploading via /configure/uploaddocument.

fileDownloadPassword.description: Password needed to download the file from fileURL

fileDownloadUser.description: User needed to download the file from fileURL

fileURL.description: URL where inSign can download the document

id.description: Document ID, to refer to later. Leave empty to automatically generate a UID.

maybedeletedbyuser.description: Document can be deleted by user.

mustbereadText.description: Deprecated: Mandatory document text for GUI.

mustbesigned.description: Deprecated: Specifies whether document must be signed. Optional. Default value is false.

ownerPasswordForReading.description: Owner Password to open the document.

preFilledFields.description: Configure non-signature annotations in the document

scanSigTags.description: This document will be scanned for SIG-Tags. This overrides inSign configuration for this document. Optional. Default value is null.

signatures.description: The preconfigured signatures in this document. For documents with BiPro signature fields leave this empty.

visibilityRuleRegexpList.description: Filters documents for viewing, downloading, editing, and handout of documents according to the Input: User-Email e.g: .*@yourdomain.de,.*@anotherdomain.com. Separate input using a comma ','

guiProperties.description:
Map of UI configuration values. You may also override any application text from mymessages.properties here. Use message.<messageid> or <language>.message.<messageid> as key, where language is de,en,fr and alike. You can find all valid messageids in mymessages.properties inside insign-service.jar. Valid values: 
|key (coresponding global property)|description
|----------------------------------|-----------
|guiNoGPS (gui.noGPS)|Should the location of tablets/mobile devices NOT be queried in the browser?
|guiActionFinishIgnoresignstatus (gui.action.finish.ignoresignstatus)|If you click on "Finish process", do ignore the message that not all signature fields have been            signed yet.        
|settingsSaveForAutocompleteAvailable (settings.saveForAutocomplete.available)|Should the "E-Mail cache" setting be available in the settings modal for gallery users?            Works only if "mail.saveForAutocompleteFilter" is set.
|settingsForcecolorAvailable (settings.forcecolor.available)|Should the "Color" setting be available in the settings modal for gallery users?
|guiOnnextopentosign (gui.onnextopentosign)|When clicking on "next signature" in the PDF editor, immediately open the pairing dialog?        
|vorgangsverwaltungPrivateProcess (vorgangsverwaltung.private.process)|Can the user mark a process as private? A private process cannot be edited or downloaded.
|vorgangsverwaltungExternDelayReminderAvailable (vorgangsverwaltung.extern.delay.reminder.available)|Should the "Send reminder" option be available in the process management? This option is shown only for processes where extern.per.sms=false and the statuses are "Signature requested" or "To edit".
|useradminPasswordExpirationDisplay (useradmin.passwordExpiration.display)|Should the password expiration option be displayed in the useradmin panel?        
|settingsExternMultiShowOtherSignaturefieldsAvailable (settings.extern.multi.showOtherSignaturefields.available)|Should "Email address visibility" be available in the Settings to all gallery users? Can be configured on a global level with extern.multi.showOtherSignaturefields. For more details look at the description there.
|aushaendigenDialogEditable (aushaendigen.dialog.editable)|Should the displayed dialog when handing out documents or completing a process have editable input fields?        
|vorgangsverwaltungDownloadBiometricDocsAvailable (vorgangsverwaltung.downloadBiometricDocs.available)|Should the option "Download incl. signature data" be available in the process management?        
|helpAvailable (help.available)|Is the action "help" available?
|addMarkFavDefault (add.mark.fav.default)|Is the "Add Marker" action favored?
|nextMarkAvailable (next.mark.available)|Is the Next Marker action available?
|vorgangsverwaltungActionAvailable (vorgangsverwaltung.action.available)|Is the action "Process Manager" available?
|finishFile (finish.file)|Is the action "Deliver by data carrier at completion of transaction" available?
|aushaendigenMustbereadAvailable (aushaendigen.mustberead.available)|Is the action "Hand over mandatory documents" available?
|deleteSignFavDefault (delete.sign.fav.default)|Is the action "Delete signature" favored?
|finishAvailable (finish.available)|Is the "Complete process" action available?
|settingsNameAvailable (settings.name.available)|Should the gallery user be able to change their name in the settings modal?
|addMarkAvailable (add.mark.available)|Is the "Add Marker" action available?
|settingsOwnMailasSenderAvailable (settings.ownMailasSender.available)|Should the "Use own e-mail as sender address" setting be available in the settings modal for gallery users?
|changeSessionNameOnFirstUpload (change.session.name.on.first.upload)|If set to true then the session name would be changed with the first upload name
|guiDisableMonitorChoice (gui.disableMonitorChoice)|Should the manual screen selection be suppressed?
|exitResetSignature (exit.reset.signature)|Should signatures be reset, when exit is used?
|saveAsTemplateAvailable (save.as.template.available)|Is the action "Save as template" available?
|externUserGuidance (extern.user.guidance)|Should the external user be guided through the signing process?
|externMultiShowOtherSignaturefields (extern.multi.showOtherSignaturefields)|Display signature fields of other user while using extern. If false pdf.signature.aes.includepersonaldata will be ignored for extern signatures and no personal data is included. Can be configured on a per user basis with settings.extern.multi.showOtherSignaturefields.available
|addFotoFavDefault (add.foto.fav.default)|Is the action "Photograph document" favored?
|externDelegateAvailable (extern.delegate.available)|Is the action "Delegate" available for a customer? With the delegate Action a customer can redirect the process to another person.
|settingsRealLocationAvailable (settings.realLocation.available)|Should the "Location" setting be available in the settings modal for gallery users? This setting requires that "Timestamp" is also available, otherwise nothing will be printed.
|guiActionOverrideTextfieldwarning (gui.action.override.textfieldwarning)|Can the user sign a document if there are still unfilled text fields?
|settingsAuditreportAvailable (settings.auditreport.available)|Should the "Audit report" setting be available in the settings modal for gallery users?
|hideApisessionsInVvw (hide.apisessions.in.vvw)|Should processes, which where created over the API, be hidden in the Process Management?
|vorgangsverwaltungDeleteAvailable (vorgangsverwaltung.delete.available)|Should the "Delete" option be available in the process management?
|guiAfterSignOpenNextSignatureField (gui.afterSignOpenNextSignatureField)|When clicking on "next signature" in the PDF editor, switch to signature mode immediately and open            the next signature field immediately after the signature has been completed.        
|aushaendigenAvailable (aushaendigen.available)|Is the "Deliver documents" action available?
|zoomAvailable (zoom.available)|Is the "Zoom in, zoom out" action available?
|saveDocAvailable (save.doc.available)|Is the action "Save document (ZIP)" available for the consultant?
|serialProcessAvailable (serial.process.available)|This activates the "Serial process" function. 
|signAvailable (sign.available)|Is the "Sign" mode available? true=automatic, false=not available
|nextSignFavDefault (next.sign.fav.default)|Is the action "Next signature" favored?
|zoomFavDefault (zoom.fav.default)|Is the action "Zoom in, zoom out" favored?
|externExitEnabled (extern.exit.enabled)|Is the "Close" action also possible for external users? If yes, make sure to provide a proper callbackurl for the external users.
|externDeleteLastSignature (extern.deleteLastSignature)|Extern-User has the abilty to delete his last signature
|guiFertigbuttonSkipModalDialog (gui.fertigbutton.skipModalDialog)|If you click on "Done", no modal dialog is displayed.
|searchAvailable (search.available)|Is the action "Next signature text" available?
|pdfSaveAlert (pdf.save.alert)|If true show success toast after save.
|externAvailable (extern.available)|Is the action "Have the process processed externally" available?
|guiEmbeddedHotspotdisabled (gui.embedded.hotspotdisabled)|Disable all features for hotspot (embeddedMode only)
|externUseDomain (extern.use.domain)|Should users who are part of security.ad.domain see their external processes in the processmanager?
|guiAllowChangeSmsEmail (gui.allow.change.smsEmail)|Is the user allowed to change phone numbers and email addresses that are supplied via API?        
|helpUrl (help.url)|The url to which the user is forwarded when using the help action. Example: https://www.somewebsite.de/support
|guiHintAllsigned (gui.hint.allsigned)|Show hint popup for saving after last signature?
|dualscreenGuiAvailable (dualscreen.gui.available)|Is the action "Dualscreen" available? THIS Property is unfinished. Don't use it!
|settingsAvailable (settings.available)|Is the "Settings" action available?
|guiHintAllsignedSkipSaveDialog (gui.hint.allsigned.skipSaveDialog)|Don't show hint popup for saving after last signature and jump directly to final dialog instead?

|passwordTransmissionUserdecisionNopassword_enabled (password.transmission.userdecision.nopassword_enabled)|Should 'no password' be an option given to the user? When the user selects this, a password will not have to be entered for the selected process.
|passwordTransmissionUserdecisionDefault (password.transmission.userdecision.default)|The default selection for the user decision dropdown
|passwordTransmissionUserdecisionAlternativemail_enabled (password.transmission.userdecision.alternativemail_enabled)|Should 'password via email' be an option given to the user? When the user selects this, the password will be sent via email.
|guiFertigbuttonSkipModalDialogExtern (gui.fertigbutton.skipModalDialogExtern)|If you click on "Done" in external mode, no modal dialog is displayed.
|systemcheckIgnoreconnect (systemcheck.ignoreconnect)|Check the connection to the local instance. True will do the check, false will disable it.
|guiProgressOptional (gui.progress.optional)|PDF Editor: Displays an additional line for optional signature fields - if available. Otherwise            only one counter is displayed if only mandatory fields are available.        
|guiUpdateThumbSignHint (gui.updateThumbSignHint)|Displays additional markers for signature fields in the thumb
|deleteSignAvailable (delete.sign.available)|Is the action "Delete signature" available?
|addformfieldAllowEveryOption (addformfield.allow.every.option)|Is the Formeditor for every editable document available and always shows every option? NOTE: If allowformediting is set to false, the editor won't be accessible.
|aushaendigenFile (aushaendigen.file)|Is the "Deliver documents by data carrier" action available?
|settingsPrivacyLinkAvailable (settings.privacyLink.available)|Should the "Privacy Link" setting be available in the settings modal for gallery users?
|guiAfterAllSignOpenIdent (gui.afterAllSignOpenIdent)|When the last signatures is done, immediately open the QES/Video-Ident modal.        
|aushaendigenMail (aushaendigen.mail)|Is the "Deliver documents by e-mail" action available?
|exitFavDefault (exit.fav.default)|Is the "[Editor] Close" action favored?
|guiFertigbuttonModalDialogExternSkipSendMail (gui.fertigbutton.ModalDialogExtern.skipSendMail)|Remove the Option "send by mail" from the final dialog for online-editors?
|consultantRenameDocuments (consultant.rename.documents)|Is the Consultant allowed to rename documents? Not possible for sessions via API.
|settingsForcedSigfieldsAvailable (settings.forced.sigfields.available)|Should the "Mandatory Fields" setting be available in the settings modal for gallery users?
|nextSignAvailable (next.sign.available)|Is the "Next Signature" action available?
|externMultiOrderDefault (extern.multi.order.default)|If extern.multi.available = true, then the order should be specified. Default is false (no            order).            Note: If the QES button is favoured in the session, then through online editing the signatures will be availed to each extern user in order.            Hence, extern.multi.available = true is always considered and the property value will be ignored.        
|guiVorgangsverwaltungenabled (gui.vorgangsverwaltungenabled)|Allow access to process management?
|searchFavDefault (search.fav.default)|Is the action "Next signature text" favored?
|guiLeavepagewarning (gui.leavepagewarning)|Show a warning in the browser when leaving the page?
|burgerAvailable (burger.available)|Is the burger menu for non favorite actions available? In mobile view the burger will always be available but only contain favorite actions if this is disabled.
|passwordTransmissionUserdecision (password.transmission.userdecision)|Should the user be able to choose the way in which the password is sent? If no Option is active it will be treated as if all options are active. Will override extern.per.sms, sendtan.sms and sendtan.muendlich. mail.zip has to be true and session.aushaendigenpflicht false.
|addformfieldFoto (addformfield.foto)|Can the user place image annotations via the formeditor?
|saveDocFavDefault (save.doc.fav.default)|Is the action "Save document (ZIP)" favored for the consultant?
|guiProgressEnabled (gui.progress.enabled)|Process manager: progress, number of signed signatures, document / transaction display? In            the case of clustering, nothing is displayed in process management.        
|passwordTransmissionUserdecisionSms_enabled (password.transmission.userdecision.sms_enabled)|Should 'password via SMS' be an option given to the user? When the user selects this, the password will be sent via sms after the link is clicked.
|nextMarkFavDefault (next.mark.fav.default)|Is the "Next selection" action favored?
|aushaendigenSms (aushaendigen.sms)|Is the "Deliver documents by SMS" action available? This option is only allowed if            sendtan.sms=true. For SMS messages the mode document.email.download=true is always used, because SMS cannot            contain attachments. If there is an obligation to confirm the delivery (flag handset obligation to confirm            at the interface), the mode handset.confirm.mode=download is always used for sending SMS messages.

|finishMail (finish.mail)|Is the action "Hand over by e-mail on completion of transaction" available?
|rejectFavDefault (reject.fav.default)|Is the "Reject" function preferred?

|aushaendigenFavDefault (aushaendigen.fav.default)|Is the action "Hand over documents" favoured?

|addFormFavDefault (add.form.fav.default)|Is the action "Add form fields" favored?
|finishFavDefault (finish.fav.default)|Is the action "Complete process" favored?

applosSmsText.description:
Deprecated: SMS-Text fr die SMS in welcher der Link fr das Unterschreiben ohne inSign-App enthalten ist.
Es stehen die gleichen Variablen wie bei dem Flag "applosMailText" zu verfgung. Auch die Regeln bezglich des Links sind wie bei dem Flag "applosMailText". since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONSignConfig.applosSmsText.

aushaendigenBestaetigenModus.description: Confirmation mode for aushaendigenBestaetigungspflicht. Overrides apllication wide setting aushaendigen.bestaetigen.modus. 'LINK': Send out a separate email containing a link, that must be clicked to confirm reception. 'DOWNLOAD': confirmation is provided by downloading the documents. 'document.email.download' and 'aushaendigenpflicht' are mandatory for this mode

aushaendigenBestaetigungspflicht.description: If handing out of documents before signing is set to 'mandatory' confirmation by the recipient will also be required

aushaendigenPflicht.description: Make handing out documents before signing mandatory. <propref:session.aushaendigenpflicht>

aushaendigungBestaetigtRedirectUrl.description: URL that is called inside the users browser after he has confirmed reception of documents for aushaendigenBestaetigungspflicht

backendHandoutFilter.description: Overrides application wide setting handout.backend.smime. since v3.36

backendHandoutFormat.description: Overrides application wide setting handout.backend.format. since v3.7.25.

backendHandoutPassword.description: Overrides application wide setting handout.backend.password. since v3.7.25.

backendHandoutRecipient.description: Overrides application wide setting handout.backend.emailrecipient. since v3.7.25

backendHandoutSmime.description: Overrides application wide setting handout.backend.smime. since v3.10.24.

beraterFocusSigField.description: Automatically navigate to the first signature field for the session owner. since v3.6.

beraterPairingTemporary.description: Deprecated: Legt fest, ob das Pairing des Beraterhandys nur fr die Session gilt. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONSignConfig.beraterPairingTemporary

blobData.description: Custom binary data attachable to the session. Might be retrieved at any time via a seperate api function

callbackURL.description: This URL is called from the browser window upon completion of the session. i.e. when the user leaves the session. URLs starting with '/' or '.', are interpreted as context relative, will be interpreted as absolute otherwise.

callbackURLForAbschliessen.description: This URL is called from the browser window upon completion of the session. i.e. when the user leaves the session. URLs starting with '/' or '.', are interpreted as context relative, will be interpreted as absolute otherwise. If you fill callbackURL only, callbackURLForAbschliessen will be set to the same value automatically

createJWT.description: Should a JWT-Token be created with the session? Since 3.32

customerFocusSigField.description: Automatically navigate to the first signature field for the external user. since v3.6.

discardBiodata.description: Discard biodata for signatures and don't add them to the pdf when sinning. Since 3.37

displaycustomer.description: Name of the customer this session is allocated to

displayname.description: Name of the session. Will be displayed as the title in the UI and used for E-Mail subjects, and downloaded files-names

documentEmailDownload.description: Deprecated: Dieser Wert legt fest, ob Emails einen Link zum Download der Dokumente enthalten sollen, anstelle der Dokumente selbst im Anhang. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.documentEmailDownload

documents.description: Documents and metadata of the documents that will belong to this session. Document binaries may be provided as Base64 encoded inside this structure or binaries might be uploaded after session creation via a seperate api which is the prefered method in terms of used bandwith

dualscreenClientId.description: Dualscreen Client ID. Enable Dual-Device synced mode. Use only if instructed to do so. since v3.9.0.

dualscreenClientMayEdit.description: Dualscreen client may edit form fields? See 'dualscreenClientId'. since v3.9.0.

einverstaendnisRequired.description: Overrides the default value of session.einverstaendnis per process. since v3.7.25.

emailEmpfaenger.description: Deprecated: Default-Wert Email-Empfnger. Falls hier nichts anderes angegeben wird, wird der Wert aus der User-Konfiguration (z.B. aus LDAP) oder aus den Properties verwendet. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.emailEmpfaenger

emailEmpfaengerBCC.description: Deprecated: Default-Wert weitere Email-Empfnger (BCC). Diese Email ist nicht in der grafischen Oberflche sichtbar. Falls hier kein Wert eingetragen wird, wird der Wert aus den Properties verwendet. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.emailEmpfaengerBCC.

emailEmpfaengerKopie.description: Deprecated: Default-Wert weitere Email-Empfnger (CC). Falls hier nichts anderes angegeben wird, wird der Wert aus der User-Konfiguration (z.B. aus LDAP) oder aus den Properties verwendet.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.emailEmpfaengerKopie.

emailEmpfaengerReadOnly.description: Deprecated: Schaltet die Bearbeitung der Empfnger Email-Adresse ein/aus sofern eine Adresse per Schnittstelle oder Admin Einstellungen bergeben wird.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.emailEmpfaengerReadOnly.

embedBiometricData.description: Attach encrypted biometric signature data to documents sent out via the UI

empfaengerBCCExtern.description: Deprecated: Default-Wert weitere Extern-Email-Empfnger (BCC). Diese Email ist nicht in der grafischen Oberflche sichtbar.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.empfaengerBCCExtern.

empfaengerCCExtern.description: Deprecated: Default-Wert weitere Email-Empfnger (CC) der externen Bearbeitung.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.empfaengerCCExtern.

empfaengerExtern.description: Deprecated: Default-Wert Email-Empfnger der externen Bearbeitung.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.empfaengerExtern.

empfaengerReadOnlyExtern.description: Deprecated: Schaltet die Bearbeitung der Extern-Empfnger Email-Adresse ein/aus sofern eine Adresse per Schnittstelle oder Admin Einstellungen bergeben wird.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.empfaengerReadOnlyExtern.

empfaengerSMS.description: Deprecated: Default-Wert SMS-Empfnger.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.empfaengerSMS.

empfaengerSMSExtern.description: Deprecated: Default-Wert SMS-Empfnger der externen Bearbeitung.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.empfaengerSMSExtern.

externAttachVVG.description: Override application wide setting 'extern.attachvvg'. since v3.7.

externCompleteOnFinish.description: Should the process be completed when the external caller ends processing? Since 3.27

externEditAllowed.description: Can externuser for this session edit textfields and checkboxes? Since 3.28

externEmailBetreff.description: Deprecated: Betreff der Email zur Externen Bearbeitung.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.externEmailBetreff.

externEmailInhalt.description: Deprecated: Inhalt der Email zur Externen Bearbeitung.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.externEmailInhalt.

externExaminerAvailable.description: Can an examiner be added when preparing a process for external processing? This extern user can only clear or reject a process

externHinweisFertig.description: Changes the value of the message for the customer when completing external processing. since v3.8.

externHinweisFertigKeinBerater.description: Changes the value of the message for the customer when completing external processing if no e-mail address is specified for the consultant (e.g., via userEmail field in this configuration). since v3.8

externHinweisFertigKeineMail.description: Changes the value of the message for the customer when completing external processing if no email address is specified for the customer. This is used when the customer does not receive e-mails with access data but accesses them via single sign-on (see JSONStartExtern). since v3.8.

externLoginRequired.description: Are external Users reuqired to log in in with a password? If set to false users only need to click the supplied link. Otherwise an additional password will be supplied via email/sms or phone. since v3.8

externPerSms.description:
The external user receives one sms with the link to edit the process online. This link gives him direkt access to the process.
            He won`t receive any mails or a sms with the password. Also no reminder mails are send.

externPhotoUploadEnabled.description: Enable upload of photo documents for external users. since v3.6.

externSendDocsOnFinish.description: Should the documents be sent to the consultant when exiting the external mode? Since 3.27

externSendDocsOnFinishCustomer.description: Should the documents be sent to the customer when external process has been finished? Since 3.27

externUploadEnabled.description: Enable upload of arbitrary documents for external users

externUserGuidance.description: Should the external user be guided through the signing process?

externWatcherAvailable.description: Can a watcher be added when preparing a process for external processing? This extern user can only observe the process.

externalPropertiesURL.description: URL to external properties- or css-file containting variables (properties-file-ending) or CSS-content (css-file-ending)

forceDownloadVVG.description: Force the external user to download the mandatory documents? Since 3.20

forgroup.description: Group owner ID of this session. Must be unambiguously mapped to the owning group (i.e. groupid). Only important if the processes should be accessable for other group members. Since v3.23

foruser.description: Owner ID of this session. Must be unambiguously mapped to the owning user (i.e. userid of the user starting this session)

gdprPopupActive.description: GDPR Mode active? Show GDPR notification before signing. since v3.8.29.

gdprRole.description: Should the DSGVO (English GDPR) popup be displayed for every role?

guiProperties.description:
Map of UI configuration values. You may also override any application text from mymessages.properties here. Use message.<messageid> or <language>.message.<messageid> as key, where language is de,en,fr and alike. You may find all valid messageids in mymessages.properties inside insign-service.jar. Valid values: 
|key (coresponding global property)|description
|----------------------------------|-----------
|guiNoGPS (gui.noGPS)|Should the location of tablets/mobile devices NOT be queried in the browser?
|guiActionFinishIgnoresignstatus (gui.action.finish.ignoresignstatus)|If you click on "Finish process", do ignore the message that not all signature fields have been            signed yet.        
|settingsSaveForAutocompleteAvailable (settings.saveForAutocomplete.available)|Should the "E-Mail cache" setting be available in the settings modal for gallery users?            Works only if "mail.saveForAutocompleteFilter" is set.
|settingsForcecolorAvailable (settings.forcecolor.available)|Should the "Color" setting be available in the settings modal for gallery users?
|guiOnnextopentosign (gui.onnextopentosign)|When clicking on "next signature" in the PDF editor, immediately open the pairing dialog?        
|vorgangsverwaltungPrivateProcess (vorgangsverwaltung.private.process)|Can the user mark a process as private? A private process cannot be edited or downloaded.
|vorgangsverwaltungExternDelayReminderAvailable (vorgangsverwaltung.extern.delay.reminder.available)|Should the "Send reminder" option be available in the process management? This option is shown only for processes where extern.per.sms=false and the statuses are "Signature requested" or "To edit".
|useradminPasswordExpirationDisplay (useradmin.passwordExpiration.display)|Should the password expiration option be displayed in the useradmin panel?        
|settingsExternMultiShowOtherSignaturefieldsAvailable (settings.extern.multi.showOtherSignaturefields.available)|Should "Email address visibility" be available in the Settings to all gallery users? Can be configured on a global level with extern.multi.showOtherSignaturefields. For more details look at the description there.
|aushaendigenDialogEditable (aushaendigen.dialog.editable)|Should the displayed dialog when handing out documents or completing a process have editable input fields?        
|vorgangsverwaltungDownloadBiometricDocsAvailable (vorgangsverwaltung.downloadBiometricDocs.available)|Should the option "Download incl. signature data" be available in the process management?        
|helpAvailable (help.available)|Is the action "help" available?
|addMarkFavDefault (add.mark.fav.default)|Is the "Add Marker" action favored?
|nextMarkAvailable (next.mark.available)|Is the Next Marker action available?
|vorgangsverwaltungActionAvailable (vorgangsverwaltung.action.available)|Is the action "Process Manager" available?
|finishFile (finish.file)|Is the action "Deliver by data carrier at completion of transaction" available?
|aushaendigenMustbereadAvailable (aushaendigen.mustberead.available)|Is the action "Hand over mandatory documents" available?
|deleteSignFavDefault (delete.sign.fav.default)|Is the action "Delete signature" favored?
|finishAvailable (finish.available)|Is the "Complete process" action available?
|settingsNameAvailable (settings.name.available)|Should the gallery user be able to change their name in the settings modal?
|addMarkAvailable (add.mark.available)|Is the "Add Marker" action available?
|settingsOwnMailasSenderAvailable (settings.ownMailasSender.available)|Should the "Use own e-mail as sender address" setting be available in the settings modal for gallery users?
|changeSessionNameOnFirstUpload (change.session.name.on.first.upload)|If set to true then the session name would be changed with the first upload name
|guiDisableMonitorChoice (gui.disableMonitorChoice)|Should the manual screen selection be suppressed?
|exitResetSignature (exit.reset.signature)|Should signatures be reset, when exit is used?
|saveAsTemplateAvailable (save.as.template.available)|Is the action "Save as template" available?
|externUserGuidance (extern.user.guidance)|Should the external user be guided through the signing process?
|externMultiShowOtherSignaturefields (extern.multi.showOtherSignaturefields)|Display signature fields of other user while using extern. If false pdf.signature.aes.includepersonaldata will be ignored for extern signatures and no personal data is included. Can be configured on a per user basis with settings.extern.multi.showOtherSignaturefields.available
|addFotoFavDefault (add.foto.fav.default)|Is the action "Photograph document" favored?
|externDelegateAvailable (extern.delegate.available)|Is the action "Delegate" available for a customer? With the delegate Action a customer can redirect the process to another person.
|settingsRealLocationAvailable (settings.realLocation.available)|Should the "Location" setting be available in the settings modal for gallery users? This setting requires that "Timestamp" is also available, otherwise nothing will be printed.
|guiActionOverrideTextfieldwarning (gui.action.override.textfieldwarning)|Can the user sign a document if there are still unfilled text fields?
|settingsAuditreportAvailable (settings.auditreport.available)|Should the "Audit report" setting be available in the settings modal for gallery users?
|hideApisessionsInVvw (hide.apisessions.in.vvw)|Should processes, which where created over the API, be hidden in the Process Management?
|vorgangsverwaltungDeleteAvailable (vorgangsverwaltung.delete.available)|Should the "Delete" option be available in the process management?
|guiAfterSignOpenNextSignatureField (gui.afterSignOpenNextSignatureField)|When clicking on "next signature" in the PDF editor, switch to signature mode immediately and open            the next signature field immediately after the signature has been completed.        
|aushaendigenAvailable (aushaendigen.available)|Is the "Deliver documents" action available?
|zoomAvailable (zoom.available)|Is the "Zoom in, zoom out" action available?
|saveDocAvailable (save.doc.available)|Is the action "Save document (ZIP)" available for the consultant?
|serialProcessAvailable (serial.process.available)|This activates the "Serial process" function. 
|signAvailable (sign.available)|Is the "Sign" mode available? true=automatic, false=not available
|nextSignFavDefault (next.sign.fav.default)|Is the action "Next signature" favored?
|zoomFavDefault (zoom.fav.default)|Is the action "Zoom in, zoom out" favored?
|externExitEnabled (extern.exit.enabled)|Is the "Close" action also possible for external users? If yes, make sure to provide a proper callbackurl for the external users.
|externDeleteLastSignature (extern.deleteLastSignature)|Extern-User has the abilty to delete his last signature
|guiFertigbuttonSkipModalDialog (gui.fertigbutton.skipModalDialog)|If you click on "Done", no modal dialog is displayed.
|searchAvailable (search.available)|Is the action "Next signature text" available?
|pdfSaveAlert (pdf.save.alert)|If true show success toast after save.
|externAvailable (extern.available)|Is the action "Have the process processed externally" available?
|guiEmbeddedHotspotdisabled (gui.embedded.hotspotdisabled)|Disable all features for hotspot (embeddedMode only)
|externUseDomain (extern.use.domain)|Should users who are part of security.ad.domain see their external processes in the processmanager?
|guiAllowChangeSmsEmail (gui.allow.change.smsEmail)|Is the user allowed to change phone numbers and email addresses that are supplied via API?        
|helpUrl (help.url)|The url to which the user is forwarded when using the help action. Example: https://www.somewebsite.de/support
|guiHintAllsigned (gui.hint.allsigned)|Show hint popup for saving after last signature?
|dualscreenGuiAvailable (dualscreen.gui.available)|Is the action "Dualscreen" available? THIS Property is unfinished. Don't use it!
|settingsAvailable (settings.available)|Is the "Settings" action available?
|guiHintAllsignedSkipSaveDialog (gui.hint.allsigned.skipSaveDialog)|Don't show hint popup for saving after last signature and jump directly to final dialog instead?        
|customerFocusSigField (customerFocusSigField)|Navigates to first signature field for USER customer
|passwordTransmissionUserdecisionNopassword_enabled (password.transmission.userdecision.nopassword_enabled)|Should 'no password' be an option given to the user? When the user selects this, a password will not have to be entered for the selected process.
|passwordTransmissionUserdecisionDefault (password.transmission.userdecision.default)|The default selection for the user decision dropdown
|passwordTransmissionUserdecisionAlternativemail_enabled (password.transmission.userdecision.alternativemail_enabled)|Should 'password via email' be an option given to the user? When the user selects this, the password will be sent via email.
|guiFertigbuttonSkipModalDialogExtern (gui.fertigbutton.skipModalDialogExtern)|If you click on "Done" in external mode, no modal dialog is displayed.
|systemcheckIgnoreconnect (systemcheck.ignoreconnect)|Check the connection to the local instance. True will do the check, false will disable it.
|guiProgressOptional (gui.progress.optional)|PDF Editor: Displays an additional line for optional signature fields - if available. Otherwise            only one counter is displayed if only mandatory fields are available.        
|guiUpdateThumbSignHint (gui.updateThumbSignHint)|Displays additional markers for signature fields in the thumb
|deleteSignAvailable (delete.sign.available)|Is the action "Delete signature" available?
|addformfieldAllowEveryOption (addformfield.allow.every.option)|Is the Formeditor for every editable document available and always shows every option? NOTE: If allowformediting is set to false, the editor won't be accessible.
|aushaendigenFile (aushaendigen.file)|Is the "Deliver documents by data carrier" action available?
|settingsPrivacyLinkAvailable (settings.privacyLink.available)|Should the "Privacy Link" setting be available in the settings modal for gallery users?
|guiAfterAllSignOpenIdent (gui.afterAllSignOpenIdent)|When the last signatures is done, immediately open the QES/Video-Ident modal.        
|aushaendigenMail (aushaendigen.mail)|Is the "Deliver documents by e-mail" action available?
|exitFavDefault (exit.fav.default)|Is the "[Editor] Close" action favored?
|guiFertigbuttonModalDialogExternSkipSendMail (gui.fertigbutton.ModalDialogExtern.skipSendMail)|Remove the Option "send by mail" from the final dialog for online-editors?
|consultantRenameDocuments (consultant.rename.documents)|Is the Consultant allowed to rename documents? Not possible for sessions via API.
|settingsForcedSigfieldsAvailable (settings.forced.sigfields.available)|Should the "Mandatory Fields" setting be available in the settings modal for gallery users?
|nextSignAvailable (next.sign.available)|Is the "Next Signature" action available?
|externMultiOrderDefault (extern.multi.order.default)|If extern.multi.available = true, then the order should be specified. Default is false (no            order).            Note: If the QES button is favoured in the session, then through online editing the signatures will be availed to each extern user in order.            Hence, extern.multi.available = true is always considered and the property value will be ignored.        
|guiVorgangsverwaltungenabled (gui.vorgangsverwaltungenabled)|Allow access to process management?
|searchFavDefault (search.fav.default)|Is the action "Next signature text" favored?
|guiLeavepagewarning (gui.leavepagewarning)|Show a warning in the browser when leaving the page?
|burgerAvailable (burger.available)|Is the burger menu for non favorite actions available? In mobile view the burger will always be available but only contain favorite actions if this is disabled.
|passwordTransmissionUserdecision (password.transmission.userdecision)|Should the user be able to choose the way in which the password is sent? If no Option is active it will be treated as if all options are active. Will override extern.per.sms, sendtan.sms and sendtan.muendlich. mail.zip has to be true and session.aushaendigenpflicht false.
|addformfieldFoto (addformfield.foto)|Can the user place image annotations via the formeditor?
|saveDocFavDefault (save.doc.fav.default)|Is the action "Save document (ZIP)" favored for the consultant?
|guiProgressEnabled (gui.progress.enabled)|Process manager: progress, number of signed signatures, document / transaction display? In            the case of clustering, nothing is displayed in process management.        
|passwordTransmissionUserdecisionSms_enabled (password.transmission.userdecision.sms_enabled)|Should 'password via SMS' be an option given to the user? When the user selects this, the password will be sent via sms after the link is clicked.
|nextMarkFavDefault (next.mark.fav.default)|Is the "Next selection" action favored?
|aushaendigenSms (aushaendigen.sms)|Is the "Deliver documents by SMS" action available? This option is only allowed if            sendtan.sms=true. For SMS messages the mode document.email.download=true is always used, because SMS cannot            contain attachments. If there is an obligation to confirm the delivery (flag handset obligation to confirm            at the interface), the mode handset.confirm.mode=download is always used for sending SMS messages.        
|dualscreenFavDefault (dualscreen.fav.default)|Is the action "Dualscreen" favored?
|guiShowHinweisExitNichtFertig (gui.showHinweisExitNichtFertig)|Show hint dialog when closing process, if process is not yet ready for completion, e.g. due to            missing signatures.        
|addformfieldAllowAes (addformfield.allowAes)|Can signature fields be created that require handwriting? This is the default signature level for insign.        
|finishPaper (finish.paper)|Is the "Deliver by paper at transaction close" action available?
|settingsTrustlinkAvailable (settings.trustlink.available)|Should the "Trustlink" setting be available in the settings modal for gallery users?
|addDocFavDefault (add.doc.fav.default)|Is the action "Add document" favored?
|settingsLogoUploadAvailable (settings.logo.upload.available)|Should the "Firm Logo-upload" be available in the settings modal for gallery users?
|aushaendigenMustbereadFavDefault (aushaendigen.mustberead.fav.default)|Is the action "Hand over mandatory documents" favoured?
|externSaveDocAvailable (extern.save.doc.available)|Is the action "Save document (ZIP)" available for the customer?
|settingsFavDefault (settings.fav.default)|Is the "Settings" action favored?
|addformfieldAvailable (addformfield.available)|Is the "Add form fields" mode available? true=automatic, false=not available?
|settingsPlugintokenApiAvailable (settings.plugintoken.api.available)|Should users created by API be able to create a plugin token. Has no relevance without license "module_pluginapi".
|exitAvailable (exit.available)|Is the Close action available?
|settingsTimestampAvailable (settings.timestamp.available)|Should the "Timestamp" setting be available in the settings modal for gallery users?
|guiSignatureQualityscaleDouble (gui.signature.qualityscale.double)|The quality or resolution of the embedded signature data displayed in the GUI. A value of 4.00            means 4 times the original resolution. Has an essential influence on performance and bandwidth!        
|vorgangDialogAvailable (vorgang.dialog.available)|Can the user edit Title of the process?
|vorgangsverwaltungPrivateProcessVisible (vorgangsverwaltung.private.process.visible)|Is a process marked private still visible, but cannot be edited or downloaded. Only works if vorgangsverwaltung.private.process is enabled.
|guiAutoRetrieveProcess (gui.auto.retrieveProcess)|Should the "Set expiration date" option be available in the request signature modal? Requires the "extern.autofinish" cronjob to be enabled
|addformfieldAllowSes (addformfield.allowSes)|Can signature fields be created that only require text input? In those fields the user can sign a document by only putting in his name.        
|vorgangsverwaltungActionFavDefault (vorgangsverwaltung.action.fav.default)|Is the "Process Manager" action favored?
|aushaendigenPaper (aushaendigen.paper)|Is the "Deliver documents on paper" action available?
|saveAsTemplateFavDefault (save.as.template.fav.default)|Is the "Save as template" action favored?
|settingsRealnameAvailable (settings.realname.available)|Should the "Real Name" setting be available in the settings modal for gallery users?
|finishMail (finish.mail)|Is the action "Hand over by e-mail on completion of transaction" available?
|rejectFavDefault (reject.fav.default)|Is the "Reject" function preferred?
|externRejectAvailable (extern.reject.available)|Should the signatory be able to reject a process?
|aushaendigenFavDefault (aushaendigen.fav.default)|Is the action "Hand over documents" favoured?
|settingsFirmAvailable (settings.firm.available)|Should the gallery user be able to change their firm in the settings modal?
|addFormFavDefault (add.form.fav.default)|Is the action "Add form fields" favored?
|finishFavDefault (finish.fav.default)|Is the action "Complete process" favored?
|guiSessionDisplaynameAndCustomerEditable (gui.sessionDisplaynameAndCustomerEditable)|Should the display name be editable in the editor and standalone view?
|serialProcessFavDefault (serial.process.fav.default)|Is the "Serial process" function preferred?
|helpFavDefault (help.fav.default)|Is the "Help" action favored?
|internetExplorerRestriction (internet.explorer.restriction)|If this is enabled, the Internet Explorer browser will no longer be supported by inSign in order to prevent broken user interfaces. Default is unsupported.
|rejectAvailable (reject.available)|This activates the "Reject" function. Attention: If a process is rejected, it will be irrevocably deleted.
|externMultiAvailable (extern.multi.available)|Can a process be output from the GUI to multiple customers?
|externFavDefault (extern.fav.default)|Is the action "Have process processed externally" favored?

gwgAllowOverrule.description: For GWG-Mode. Allow user to finish without providing ID-card-photos

gwgMax.description: Maximum number of images needed for the GWG-Mode

gwgMin.description: Minimum number of images needed for the GWG-Mode

gwgModus.description: Use GWG-Mode (Require ID-card Photos to be supplied)

logoExtern.description: Logo for the login page for external users

mailUsedocumentdisplayname.description: For sent files, use the display name for the attachment name? Otherwise, the file name is used. Since 3.27

mailZip.description:
Should e-mail attachments be sent as ZIP files? Alternatively, the files can be sent unencrypted or
            encrypted using a PDF user password. Note: This value becomes relevant only when document.email.download is disabled. Since 3.27

mailZipEncryptmethod.description:
The encryption method of the attachments in sent emails. pkzip' is an old, less secure and aes a
            newer, more secure format (256bit key). AES encrypted files cannot be opened under Windows XP with on-board
            tools but only with additional tools (e.g. Winrar,7Zip), therefore 'pkzip' is set as default value. Since 3.27

mailZipPasswordEnabled.description: Should the sent zip/pdf file be password protected? In conjunction with mail.zip=false the resulting pdfs will be encrypted. Since 3.27

makeFieldsMandatory.description: Force the user to fill in mandatory fields before signing? This value overrides gui.action.override.textfieldwarning

maskAuditReport.description: Should sensible data in the report or elsewhere (e. g. on the landing and login pages) be masked with the logging.mask.symbol? Sensible data contains mail addresses and phone numbers. Since 3.17

mtanRecipient.description: SMS recipient number for MTAN. If not provided and mtanRecipientDynamicEnabled=false signing with MTAN will be disabled

muendlicheTANUebermittlung.description: Disable sending TAN numbers via email or SMS. The Code is only displayed in the UI and has to be told to the user via phone if this flag is enabled.

mustbereadEmailBetreff.description: Deprecated: Betreff der Email, die die Pflicht-Dokumente enthlt. Im String knnen mehrere Variable verwendet werden.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.mustbereadEmailBetreff.

mustbereadEmailInhalt.description: Deprecated: Inhalt der Email, die die Pflicht-Dokumente enthlt. Im String knnen mehrere Variable verwendet werden.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.mustbereadEmailInhalt.

nameDesBeratenenKunden.description: Name of the customer this dossier is used for. Is used in emails and the UI

needToAcceeptToSignText.description: Set a text the user needs to accept everytime a document is signed. HTML is permitted for this field. since v3.9.0.

offlineEnabled.description: Deprecated: Dieser Wert legt fest, ob Vorgnge in den Offline-Modus bergeben werden knnen. since=v3.1

passwordUserDecision.description: Should the user be able to choose the way in which the password is sent? Since 3.24

passwordUserDecisionDefault.description: The default selection for the user decision dropdown. Possible values:(nopassword,alternativemail,sms). Since 3.24

passwordUserDecisionEmailEnabled.description: Should 'password via email' be an option given to the user? Since 3.24

passwordUserDecisionNoPasswordEnabled.description: Should 'no password' be an option given to the user?  Since 3.24

passwordUserDecisionSmsEnabled.description: Should 'password via SMS' be an option given to the user?  Since 3.24

pdfAutoSaveFormediting.description: When filling in the form fields, the process is saved as soon as the user does not make an entry for a certain period of time (in seconds). Possible values: -1 there is no automatic saving 0 it is saved at each 'blur' 1 - ... Time in seconds when to save

pdfEditorOnly.description: Deprecated: Dieser Wert legt fest, ob die Drehscheibe angezeigt wird (false) oder ob die Dokumente sofort in den PDF-Editor geladen werden (true). since v3.1.

pdfSignatureIncludePersonalData.description: Include personal data like name and email adress in the reason field for AES signatures

pdfSignatureRealnamePosition.description: Position for the realname in the signature. Valid values are 'top,right', 'top,left', 'bottom,right' and 'bottom,left'. Overrides application wide setting pdf.signature.realname.position. since v3.32.

pdfbitmapColorfullnessValue.description: Value after recognition of how many colors the page has and how a photo should be treated. Display color according to rgb24. Since 3.27

pdfbitmapFormat.description: PNG color depth. The use of 16 grayscales (i.e. gray4) is recommended, as this offers an optimum balance between display quality, performance and transmission bandwidth. Since 3.27

pdfbitmapThumbformat.description: PNG color depth for thumbnails. The use of 4 grayscales (i.e gray2) is recommended as this provides an optimal balance between display quality, performance and transmission bandwidth. Since 3.27

pdfforcecolor.description: Force pdfs to be always rendered in color. Otherwise only if pdfbitmap.colorfullnessValue is reached. By default it will always be rendered according to pdfbitmap.format/pdfbitmap.thumbformat

permanentApplos.description: This value determines whether pairing without the app is permanent.

photoApplosEnabled.description: Deprecated: Enable upload of photos via mobile devices without using the inSign App

photoScanExpression.description: Regular Expression for fields in the document, that should be treated as image-annotations

photoUploadEnabled.description: Enable upload of photos via the UI

photoUploadType.description: Valid values are 'own' and 'attach'. own: Uploaded photo creates a new PDF document. attach: Uploaded photo is attached to the currently selected document as a new page

realLocationInputRequired.description: Has the signer to input his location after making a signature?

realLocationInputSkippable.description: Can the signer skip the input of his location after making a signature?

realNameInputRequired.description: Has the signer to input his name as real name after making a signature?

realNameInputSkippable.description: Can the signer skip the input of his name as real name after making a signature?

replyTo.description: Deprecated: Default-Wert an welchen eMail-Empfnger soll beim antworten auf die eMail die Antwort geschickt werden. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.replyTo.

returnPath.description: Deprecated: Default-Wert an welchen Server soll eine Fehlerbenachrichtung geschickt werden wenn die eMail nicht zustellbar ist. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.returnPath.

rollenZuPrimaerUnterschrift.description: Deprecated: Wenn das Kennzeichen unterschriftenRollenbasiertAktiv aktiv ist, gibt dieses Flag an, welche technischen Unterschriftsrollen mit der primren (Berater oder angemeldeter Hauptbenutzer mit dauerhaften Pairingmglichkeiten) Unterschriftsmethode geleistet werden sollen. Ein * kann hier als Wildcard verwendet werden, fr alle Rollen, die sonst nicht zugeordnet werden knnen. Wird das Feld leer gelassen, wird hier die Default Rolle Berater verwendet.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONSignatureRoleConfig.rollenZuPrimaerUnterschrift.

rollenZuSekundaerUnterschrift.description: Deprecated: Wenn das Kennzeichen unterschriftenRollenbasiertAktiv aktiv ist, gibt dieses Flag an, welche technischen Unterschriftsrollen mit der sekundren (Kunde oder hnliches) Unterschriftsmethode geleistet werden sollen. Ein * kann hier als Wildcard verwendet werden, fr alle Rollen, die sonst nicht zugeordnet werden knnen. Wird das Feld leer gelassen, wird hier die Default Rolle Kunde verwendet.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONSignatureRoleConfig.rollenZuSekundaerUnterschrift.

selectableRoles.description: If key-value pairs are provided here the UI will allow to select from these roles for signatures instead of input fields for email/phone in multi extern mode. The key can be a roleID (for usage afterwards with API) or an email adress. The value will be used for display. Since 3.25

sendAuditReport.description: Should the report containing sensible data be sent to the external user and/or other people who are involved in the process? If turned off, the audit report is only accessible by the process owner. Since 3.30

sendMAILbestaetigungberater.description: Send a notification email to the session owner when the external user(s) have finished processing

senderEmail.description: Email-adress will be used in emails sent out as sender mail. Only relevant if 'mail.from' is empty. Since v3.26

sendtanmail.description: Should the access password be sent in a separate message (SMS/E-Mail) to the same recipients as the signed documents?

serverSidecallbackURL.description: This webhook will be called (HTTP-GET) from the inSign server on any event regarding this session. The eventID will be passed as URL-parameter 'eventid'. Possible eventIDs are EXTERNBEARBEITUNGFERTIG=all external users have finished editing, VORGANGABGESCHLOSSEN=session has been finished, SIGNATURERSTELLT=signature has ben created, SESSIONREMINDER=reminder event for stale sessions, EXTERNREMINDER=reminder event for stale session in external processiong state. Session-ID will be supplied as request-parameter 'sessionid'.

showHinweisExitNichtFertig.description: Show alert message when user tries to finish a session that can not yet be finished (e.g. if there are missing signatures)

signTimestampColor.description: Color for the date in the signature as hex of format '#000000'. Overrides application wide setting pdf.signature.date.color. since v3.32.

signTimestampEnabled.description: This value decides whether a datetime-stamp is stamped on top of the signature-field when signing a document

signTimestampFont.description: Font for the date in the signature. Overrides application wide setting pdf.signature.date.font. since v3.32.

signTimestampFontSize.description: Font size for the date in the signature. Overrides application wide setting pdf.signature.date.fontSize. since v3.32.

signTimestampFontStyle.description: Font style for the date in the signature. Valid values are 'bold', 'italic and 'plain'. Overrides application wide setting pdf.signature.date.fontStyle. since v3.32.

signTimestampPosition.description: Position for the date in the signature. Valid values are 'top,right', 'top,left', 'bottom,right' and 'bottom,left'. Overrides application wide setting pdf.signature.date.position. since v3.32.

signatureLevel.description: Used signaturelevel for the session? SES, AES or QES are valid values. Since 3.27

signatureRoleConfig.description: Technical signature roles for primary and secondary signature method

smsNumberRegionDefault.description: What should be used as the default region for a phone number without country code? Specified as ISO-3166-1 country code. Since 3.18

smsVersandEnabled.description: Enable sending of transaction numbers and passcodes via SMS. Note that an SMS-provider-services has to be configured in the application to use this

tanEmailBetreff.description: Deprecated: Betreff der Email, die die Transaktionsnummern enthlt.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.tanEmailBetreff.

tanEmailInhalt.description: Deprecated: Inhalt der Email, die die Transaktionsnummer enthlt.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.tanEmailInhalt.

tanSMSText.description: Deprecated: Inhalt der SMS, die die Transaktionsnummer enthlt.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.tanSMSText.

template.description: Create session as a session template. since v3.9.0.

unterschriebenEmailBetreff.description: Deprecated: Betreff der ersten Email, die die unterschriebenen Dokumente enthlt. Im String knnen mehrere Variable verwendet werden.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.unterschriebenEmailBetreff.

unterschriebenEmailInhalt.description: Deprecated: Inhalt der ersten Email, die die unterschriebenen Dokumente enthlt. In dem String knnen mehrere Variable verwendet werden.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.unterschriebenEmailInhalt.

unterschriftenRollenbasiertAktiv.description: User role from signature metadata to auto select the signature device

upadSupport.description: Deprecated: Dieser Wert erlaubt, die Unterschrift per U-Pad zu leisten. Wenn dieser Wert nicht gesetzt wird, gilt der Wert upad.support in insign.properties.. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONSignConfig.upadSupport.

uploadDocValidationLevel.description: This value determines the level of validation to be performed on the document before it is uploaded. strict=validate entire document, lax=validate only first level of the document including annotation configuration, none=do not validate

uploadEnabled.description: Enable Upload of arbitrary documents via the UI. Upload is only possible if global uploadenabled flag is set to true, too

userEmail.description: Email-adress of the 'foruser' owner of this session. Will be used inside the UI and in emails sent out on behalf of this user

userFullName.description: Full name of the 'foruser' owner of this session. Will be used inside the UI and in emails sent out on behalf of this user

vorgangsVerwaltungEnabled.description: Enable access to the process manager where user can manage their sessions. If disabled, offlineEnabled and externEnabled will be disabled, too, as these functions require the process manager to be enabled

watermarkDocuments.description: Comma separated list of document IDs to which watermarking will be applied. Leave empty to apply watermaking to all documents

watermarkTrustlink.description: Adds the inSign trustlink to the watermark by overriding the 'watermark.content' and 'watermark.position' values

workflowFinishAfterLastSign.description: Should the process be completed automatically as soon as the last mandatory signature has been executed?

writeAuditReport.description: Should audit data be collected for every new process? And an report (PDF) with all of this data be available / downloadable? Since 3.17

zipAttachmentEncryptionFilter.description: Regex-Filter for encrypting sent out zip files. Example.: incl: "^(.(?!gmail\.com))*$"   // ".(?!stringToExclude)". since v3.6.

zuLesendeEmailBetreff.description: Deprecated: Betreff der Email, die alle Dokumente enthlt. Im String knnen mehrere Variable verwendet werden.. since v3.2. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.alleEmailBetreff.

zuLesendeEmailInhalt.description: Deprecated: Inhalt der Email, die alle Dokumente enthlt. Im String knnen mehrere Variable verwendet werden.. since v3.2. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.alleEmailInhalt.

anrede.description: Form of address for this signature field

displayname.description: Functional role for the signature (Who is supposed to sign here). The text is displayed on the signature pad and in acrobat reader. If empty the technical role will be used here.

externRole.description: The element's technical role for external editing, relevant for signature fields

gebdat.description: Date of birth for this signature field

id.description: Signatur ID, must be distinct per document

nachname.description: Last name for this signature field

posindex.description: Order of the signatures in the PDF and for the client(UI). Spaces or duplicates aren't a problem. The position (page,y,x) is used as a secondary criteria for sorting

position.description: Position of the signature in the PDF by reference or coordinates

role.description: Technical role for the signature (Who is supposed to sign here)

signatureLevel.description: Legal level of signature. Allowed values: 'SES', 'AES' and 'QES. Default: 'AES'

textsearch.description: Scan the documents content for this text and re-calculate the positions and number of fields according to to matches. The meaning of coordinates given in 'position' will change in this case. These x0 and y0 are now meant to be offsets to the match-positions lower left corner. Use trailing and/or leading spaces to avoid 'N2' to be found in 'N25'. The value must be a valid Java regular expression. See more Info regarding this feature at https://confluence.is2.de/display/IKB/Documentation+for+external+requests

visibility.description: Should the signature be visible? Allowed: VISIBLE, HIDDEN, VISIBLE_BUT_DOES_NOT_PRINT, HIDDEN_BUT_PRINTABLE

vorname.description: First name for this signature field

numberOfJobsExecuted.description: scheduler number of jobs executed so far

abgeschlossenEmailBetreff.description: The subject of the email that will be sent on completion. Available placeholders: <enumref:de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.TemplateVar>

abgeschlossenEmailInhalt.description: Content of the email that will be sent on completion. Available placeholders: <enumref:de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.TemplateVar>

alleEmailBetreff.description: Subject of the email containing all documents. Available placeholders: <enumref:de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.TemplateVar>

alleEmailInhalt.description: Content of the email containing all documents. Available placeholders: <enumref:de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.TemplateVar>

documentEmailDownload.description: This value determines whether emails should contain a link to download the documents instead of the documents themselves as an attachment. since v2.3

emailEmpfaenger.description: Default Email Recipient. Unless specified otherwise, the value from the user configuration (for example LDAP) or from the application properties is used.

emailEmpfaengerBCC.description: Deprecated: (Deprecated) Default value other Email Recipients (BCC). This email is not visible in the graphical interface. If no value is entered here, the value from the application properties is used.

emailEmpfaengerKopie.description: Deprecated: (Deprecated) Default value other Email Recipients (CC). Unless specified otherwise, the value from the user configuration (for example LDAP) or from the application properties is used.

emailEmpfaengerReadOnly.description: Switches editing of the recipient's email address to on or off if an address is transferred via interface or admin settings.

empfaengerBCCExtern.description: Default value other external email recipients (BCC). This email is not visible in the graphical interface.

empfaengerCCExtern.description: Default value other email recipients (CC) for external processing.

empfaengerExtern.description: Default value Email Recipient for external processing.

empfaengerReadOnlyExtern.description: Switches editing of the external user's email address to on or off if an address is transferred via interface or admin settings.

empfaengerSMSExtern.description: Default value SMS recipient for external processing.

erinnerungEmailBetreff.description: The subject of the email sent to the customer as a reminder. Available placeholders: <enumref:de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.TemplateVar>

erinnerungEmailInhalt.description: Content of the email sent to the customer as a reminder. Available placeholders: <enumref:de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.TemplateVar>

externEmailBetreff.description: Subject of the email for external processing. Available placeholders: <enumref:de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.TemplateVar&gt:

externEmailInhalt.description: Content of the email for external processing. Available placeholders: <enumref:de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.TemplateVar>

mustbereadEmailBetreff.description: Subject of the email containing the required documents. Available placeholders: <enumref:de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.TemplateVar>

mustbereadEmailInhalt.description: Content of the email containing the required documents. Available placeholders: <enumref:de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.TemplateVar>

passwortEmailBetreff.description: The subject of the password email. Available placeholders: <enumref:de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.TemplateVar>

passwortEmailInhalt.description: Content of the password email. Available placeholders: <enumref:de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.TemplateVar>

replyTo.description: Default value specifying which email replies must be sent to

returnPath.description: Default value to which server an error message should be sent if the email cannot be delivered

tanEmailBetreff.description: Deprecated: Subject of the email containing the transaction numbers. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.passwortEmailBetreff.

tanEmailInhalt.description: Deprecated: Content of the email containing the transaction number. since v3.6. replacement: de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.JSONDeliveryConfig.passwortEmailInhalt.

tanSMSText.description: Content of the SMS containing the transaction number. Available placeholders: <enumref:de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.TemplateVar>

unterschriebenEmailBetreff.description: Subject of the first email containing the signed documents. Available placeholders: <enumref:de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.TemplateVar>

unterschriebenEmailInhalt.description: Content of the first email containing the signed documents. Multiple variables can be used in the string. Available placeholders: <enumref:de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.TemplateVar>

userHandoutConfigList.description: To configure multiple users that would be used in handing out documents. since v3.34

zurueckholenEmailBetreff.description: The subject of the email sent to the customer when retrieving a process. Available placeholders: <enumref:de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.TemplateVar>

zurueckholenEmailInhalt.description: Content of the email sent to the customer when retrieving a process. Available placeholders: <enumref:de.is2.sign.service.rest.json.TemplateVar>

appKundeSupport.description: This value determines whether the customer can sign via the inSign app.

appSupport.description: Allow use of the inSign Mobile App for the session owner?

applosFotoKundeMailBetreff.description:
E-mail subject for the e-mail containing the link for taking pictures without the inSign app.
Here you can use the same variables as with the flag "applosMailText".

applosFotoKundeMailText.description:
E-mail text for the email containing the link for taking pictures without the inSign app.
Here you can use the same variables as with the flag "applosMailText".

applosFotoKundeSmsText.description:
SMS text for the SMS containing the link for taking pictures without the inSign app.
The same variables are available as with the "applosMailText" flag, and the rules for the link are the same as for the "applosMailText" flag.

applosFotoMailBetreff.description:
E-mail subject for the e-mail containing the link for taking pictures without the inSign app.
Here you can use the same variables as with the flag "applosMailText".

applosFotoMailText.description:
E-mail text for the email containing the link for taking pictures without the inSign app.
Here you can use the same variables as with the flag "applosMailText".

applosFotoSmsText.description:
SMS text for the SMS containing the link for taking pictures without the inSign app.
The same variables are available as with the "applosMailText" flag, and the rules for the link are the same as for the "applosMailText" flag.

applosKundeMailBetreff.description:
E-mail subject for the e-mail containing the link for signing without the inSign app.
Here you can use the same variables as with the flag "applosMailText".

applosKundeMailText.description:
E-mail text for the e-mail to the customer in which the link for signing without inSign app is included.
The following placeholders can be used in this text.
${$RootUrl} - The URL of the insign-Installation (eg.: http://localhost:8080/insign).
${$PairingCode} - The code for pairing between inSign and Browser.
${$SessionName} - The name of the process (displayname).
${$KundeName} - The name of the customer.
${$BeraterName} - The name of the consultant (Session owner).
${$SignAppLink} - Link for the applos call.To use the placeholders in the text, the following syntax must be followed: ${<Variable>}

applosKundePerEmail.description: This value determines whether the customer can sign without inSign app via e-mail.

applosKundePerEmailEmpfaenger.description: E-mail address of the customer for signature without inSign app.

applosKundePerQRCode.description: This value determines whether the customer can sign without inSign app via QR code. Since 3.32

applosKundePerSms.description: This value determines whether the customer can sign without inSign app via sms.

applosKundePerSmsEmpfaenger.description: Telephone number of the customer for signature without inSign-App via SMS.

applosKundeSmsText.description:
SMS text for the SMS in which the link for signing without inSign app is included.
The same variables are available as with the "applosMailText" flag, and the rules for the link are the same as for the "applosMailText" flag.

applosMailBetreff.description:
E-mail subject for the e-mail containing the link for signing without the inSign app.
Here you can use the same variables as with the flag "applosMailText".

applosMailText.description:
Email body for signature without the app by email mode
The following placeholders may be used:
${$RootUrl} - inSign webapp root URL (e.g.: http://localhost:8080/insign).
${$PairingCode} - the supplied pairing code.
${$SessionName} - the session name (i.e. displayname).
${$KundeName} - customer full name.
${$BeraterName} - session owner full name.
${$SignAppLink} - the supplied link.Use the follwing syntax for the placeholders: ${<Variable>}

applosPerEmail.description: Allow use of signature without the app mode via email for the session owner?

applosPerEmailEmpfaenger.description: Session owner email address for signature without the app by email mode

applosPerQRCode.description: Allow use of the signature without the app mode via QR code for the session owner? Since 3.32

applosPerSms.description: Allow use of the signature without the app mode via SMS for the session owner?

applosPerSmsEmpfaenger.description: Session owner mobile number for signature without the app by sms mode

applosPerTouch.description: Override touch detection for the session owner? If set, the session owner must use a touch deveice to sign directly

applosSmsText.description:
SMS text for the SMS in which the link for signing without the inSign app is included.
The same variables are available as with the "applosMailText" flag, and the rules for the link are the same as for the "applosMailText" flag.

rollenZuPrimaerUnterschrift.description: If the unterschriftenRollenbasiertAktiv flag is active, this flag specifies which technical signature roles should use the primary signature method (consultant or logged in permanent end user). A * can be used here as a wildcard, for all roles that cannot otherwise be assigned. If the field is passed with null, the fields already defined when the session was created will be used. If an empty array is passed, the previous roles are overwritten.

rollenZuSekundaerUnterschrift.description: If the unterschriftenRollenbasiertAktiv flag is active, this flag specifies which technical signature roles should use the secondary (customer or similar) signature method. A * can be used here as a wildcard, for all roles that can not otherwise be assigned. If the field is passed with null, the fields already defined when the session was created will be used. If an empty array is passed, the previous roles are overwritten.
